name: To be Ageless
description:
Partake on your quest to stop the inevitability aging and death for everyone...

(Added in Post Jam Version) To change the look sensitivity press pause and go to settings!

Controls:

Pause: [ESCAPE]

Move: [W][A][S][D]

Jump: [SPACE]

Sprint: [LEFT SHIFT]

Attack: [LEFT MOUSE]

Roll: [Q]

Heal: [R]

Interact: [E]
